title: Weighted Covariance Matrix — .wcov
text: wcov computes estimates weighted covariance matrix weighted mean data.

title: Weighted Covariance Matrix — .wcov
text: x matrix \(m\) columns \(n\) rows, column represents different variable row different observation. w non-negative non-zero vector weights observation. length must equal number rows x.

title: Weighted Covariance Matrix — .wcov
text: list two components: center: estimate center (mean) data. cov: estimated (weighted) covariance matrix.

title: Weighted Covariance Matrix — .wcov
code: m <- matrix(c(rnorm(500, 6), rnorm(500, 11, 3)), ncol = 2) w <- runif(500) gravitree:::.wcov(m, w) #> Error in loadNamespace(x): there is no package called ‘gravitree’

title: Four Gaussian Clusters — four_Gaussians
text: Matrix 2-dimensional points forming four Gaussian clusters.

title: Three Gaussian Clusters — three_Gaussians
text: Matrix 2-dimensional points forming three Gaussian clusters.
